name: AdPeople Worldwide
tagline: Marketing and Advertising Agency New York
description:
AdPeople Worldwide is a global advertising agency network that operates in a digital world.We create brand stories that come to life through customer-centric content, delivered with relevant marketing technology platforms in over 70 markets.Expert employees from over 50 different nationalities work in our regional offices in Austin, Copenhagen, Miami and Singapore.
We also have market-specific offices in Shanghai, Bangalore, Tokyo and New York, plus 24/7 off-shoring solutions for global production services in Dhaka.
